properties.name: info
properties.description: Arbitrary properties to add to the info endpoint.

properties.name: management.auditevents.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable storage of audit events.

properties.name: management.defaults.metrics.export.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable default metrics exporters.

properties.name: management.endpoints.jackson.isolated-object-mapper
properties.description: Whether to use an isolated object mapper to serialize endpoint JSON.

properties.name: management.endpoints.jmx.unique-names
properties.description: Whether unique runtime object names should be ensured.

properties.name: management.health.defaults.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable default health indicators.

properties.name: management.health.diskspace.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable disk space health check.

properties.name: management.health.influxdb.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable InfluxDB health check.

properties.name: management.health.livenessstate.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable liveness state health check.

properties.name: management.health.mongo.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable MongoDB health check.

properties.name: management.health.ping.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable ping health check.

properties.name: management.health.probes.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable liveness and readiness probes.

properties.name: management.health.rabbit.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable RabbitMQ health check.

properties.name: management.health.readinessstate.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable readiness state health check.

properties.name: management.health.ssl.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable SSL certificate health check.

properties.name: management.httpexchanges.recording.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable HTTP request-response exchange recording.

properties.name: management.info.build.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable build info.

properties.name: management.info.defaults.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable default info contributors.

properties.name: management.info.env.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable environment info.

properties.name: management.info.git.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable git info.

properties.name: management.info.java.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Java info.

properties.name: management.info.os.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Operating System info.

properties.name: management.info.process.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable process info.

properties.name: management.info.ssl.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable SSL certificate info.

properties.name: management.logging.export.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration of logging is enabled to export logs.

properties.name: management.metrics.graphql.autotime.enabled
properties.description: Whether to automatically time web client requests.

properties.name: management.metrics.graphql.autotime.percentiles
properties.description: Computed non-aggregable percentiles to publish.

properties.name: management.metrics.graphql.autotime.percentiles-histogram
properties.description: Whether percentile histograms should be published.

properties.name: management.metrics.mongo.command.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Mongo client command metrics.

properties.name: management.metrics.mongo.connectionpool.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Mongo connection pool metrics.

properties.name: management.metrics.web.client.request.autotime.enabled
properties.description: Whether to automatically time web client requests.

properties.name: management.metrics.web.client.request.autotime.percentiles
properties.description: Computed non-aggregable percentiles to publish.

properties.name: management.metrics.web.client.request.autotime.percentiles-histogram
properties.description: Whether percentile histograms should be published.

properties.name: management.metrics.web.server.request.autotime.enabled
properties.description: Whether to automatically time web server requests.

properties.name: management.metrics.web.server.request.autotime.percentiles
properties.description: Computed non-aggregable percentiles to publish.

properties.name: management.metrics.web.server.request.autotime.percentiles-histogram
properties.description: Whether percentile histograms should be published.

deprecation.reason: Not needed anymore, direct instrumentation in Spring MVC.

properties.name: management.observations.annotations.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration of Micrometer annotations is enabled.

properties.name: management.otlp.logging.export.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration of logging is enabled to export OTLP logs.

properties.name: management.otlp.tracing.export.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration of tracing is enabled to export OTLP traces.

properties.name: management.server.add-application-context-header
properties.description: Add the "X-Application-Context" HTTP header in each response.

properties.name: management.tracing.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration of tracing is enabled to export and propagate traces.

properties.name: management.zipkin.tracing.export.enabled
properties.description: Whether auto-configuration of tracing is enabled to export Zipkin traces.
